original_text: Jacob arrived back at his father Isaac's home. This was in Mamre, also called Kiriath Arba, or Hebron. It was the place where Abraham and Isaac had stayed.
korean_text: 야곱이 기럇아르바의 마므레로 가서 그의 아버지 이삭에게 이르렀으니 기럇아르바는 곧 아브라함과 이삭이 거류하던 헤브론이더라

sentences.original_text: Jacob arrived back at his father Isaac's home.
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 그 아버지 이삭의 집으로 돌아왔다.

sentences.original_text: It was the place where Abraham and Isaac had stayed.
